episode: My brother was in town last week, visiting with my father. I felt like I should visit but did not feel like making the drive, which I still feel guilty about.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My brother was in town last week visiting my father. I didn't feel like making the drive so did not go to see them. I feel pretty guilty about it still.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable to feel that way. Maybe you can call them or plan a visit soon to make up for it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's a pretty good idea. I just feel bad about not wanting to make the effort. I really had no good excuse not to go, other than I just didn't feel like driving there.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Don't beat yourself up. Sometimes we just need a break. Just make it up next time!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I know you are right and I shouldn't agonize over this. Sometimes I have a hard time letting things go.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's totally normal. Just take it easy on yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Should I apologize to them or just try to do better next time?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A simple apology might help, then focus on doing better next time.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Logically, I know you are right. It can be really hard to let things go, though!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get it, letting go is tough. Just take it one step at a time!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I guess we are always hardest on ourselves!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, we sure are!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Is there anything else that I can do in the meantime?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe plan a fun activity for when you see them next!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's a good idea, to let them know I am excited to visit with them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Exactly, it'll show you care!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you for the advice. I will call them today.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome! Sounds like a great plan.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, hopefully they'll be free to get together again soon.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fingers crossed!
